data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR, Regulations, 2015, please find attached transcript of Investor''s Conference Call held on February 16, 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: In furtherance to the intimation dated February 13, 2024, whereby the Company had informed the Stock Exchanges that the Company had arranged a Conference Call for the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2023, on Friday, February 16, 2024, and in compliance with the provisions of Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please be informed that the Audio Recording of the Conference Call has been uploaded on our Company's website and the same can be accessed at https://epackdurable.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Concall-Epack-Durable-Limited-16022024.mp3.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Please find attached Investor presentation for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2023.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Please find enclosed press release and investor presentation on the Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2023.
